Detailed Description

template<class SRCTYPE, class FEATURETYPE> template class XVGroupTracker

XVGroupTracker.

Author(s):
Sam Lang
Version:
Id: XVGroupTracker.h,v 1.6 2005/02/22 02:35:54 cvsuser Exp

XVGroupTracker is just like XVTracker, except you can have multiple features.

See also:
XVTracker , XVVideo , XVFeature
